text.section: A person who is summoned for jury service under this title may not fail to complete jury service as directed.
A jury judge may order a person who violates any provision of this section to appear and show cause for each violation.
A person who fails to show good cause for a violation of this section is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or both.
